メソッドの詳細

abortOnError

public DownloadOption.Builder abortOnError(boolean abortOnError)
Abort on error or not. If false, Downloader just ignore the error target, and try next.

build

public DownloadOption build()
Return configured DownloadOption instance

canResume

public DownloadOption.Builder canResume(boolean canResume)
Enable resume or not. This is prior params than abortOnError

onGoingMessage

public DownloadOption.Builder onGoingMessage(java.lang.CharSequence message)
Message for Notification on downloading

suspendMessage

public DownloadOption.Builder suspendMessage(java.lang.CharSequence message)
Message for Notification on download suspended. This should have the message like 'Tap to Resume'

ticker

public DownloadOption.Builder ticker(java.lang.CharSequence ticker)
Ticker for status-bar
